creator: neilmarj@yahoo.co.uk
text:
Exception in thread "main" javax.xml.parsers.FactoryConfigurationError:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.crimson.jaxp.SAXParserFactoryImpl
        at
javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory.newInstance(SAXParserFactory.java:120)
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.xml.XmlMapper.readXml(XmlMapper.java:210)
        at org.apache.tomcat.startup.Tomcat.execute(Tomcat.java:187)
        at org.apache.tomcat.startup.Tomcat.main(Tomcat.java:235)

Currently installed are all current releases Tomcat 3.2.1, Ant, Servletapi, Jaxp
1.1, Xerces 1.3.1 JSDK 1.3.0, JSSE 1.0.2.

All products installed with no problems and I have also built mod_jk for Apache
1.3.19. When I start Tomcat I get the above error. Appologies  that I am not a
Java programmer, but a Unix Admin so if this is a trivial fault I'm sorry for
troubling you.
I have tried setting the $CLASSPATH to just the JDK with no success, and also
setting it to all class directories and all *jar files on the system with no
difference.

Can anyone help?

creator: neilmarj@yahoo.co.uk
text:
Fault cleared after removal of JAXP 1.1 and install of JAXP 1.0.1 and recompile
of Tomcat.

As noted by the submitter the problem was caused by using an unsupported JAXP
version.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
